rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS1141, ATS2141}

(Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ATS1142} and  Incompatible with course version org unit in {50000561} with course status in {ENROLLED, INACTIVE, INTERMIT} and  Incompatible with course version in {0080, 0082, 0116, 0170, 0530, 0542, 0660, 0978, 0980, 1053, 1054, 1055, 1138, 1185, 1208, 1209, 1210, 1211, 1260, 1262, 1377, 1497, 1541, 1620, 1641, 1733, 1791, 1800, 1804, 1807, 1880, 1941, 1995, 1996, 1997, 1998, 2025, 2317, 3199, 3237, 3238, 3239, 3426} with course status in {ENROLLED, INACTIVE, INTERMIT})

proh: Students enrolled in Arts courses are prohibited from taking this unit. In addition, students taking this unit are excluded from taking ATS1142.
description: This unit aims to develop knowledge, strategies and skills needed to interact in Japanese in practical contexts in Australia and Japan and also aims to extend linguistic, sociolinguistic and sociocultural knowledge to develop cross-cultural awareness and facilitate effective interaction.
